alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:29AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, northwestern Gulf, Bay, Calhoun, east central Walton and southern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 715 AM EDT/615 AM CDT/... At 629 AM EDT/529 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Vernon to near Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Vernon, Springfield, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Wewahitchka, Live Oak, Altha, Wausau, Ebro, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Abe Springs, Dirego Park, College Station, West Panama City and Chipola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Washington
